column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The staff is very protective of the precious pieces here
column2: so please respect their positions. I was impressed with how they do cover all the areas to make sure no tampering is going on. The institute is very well organized by timeline
column4: and genres. There is definitely WAY TOO MUCH to see here
column5: so be sure to plan your day accordingly. You can most likely hang out here for about 3-4 hours especially if you love art
